script:
# script "lisp"
# background "Manga_back"
# bgm "stop"
# bottonsout 0 0
# frameout 0 0
# textwindow "close"
# imageset 0 "Manga_logo"
# imagealpha 0 0 0
# imagelayer 0 8
# imageset 1 "Manga_00_1_0"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 8
# imagescale 1 0.9 0
# imageset 2 "Manga_00_1_1"
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagelayer 2 10
# imagescale 2 0.9 0
# imageset 3 "Manga_00_1_2"
# imagealpha 3 0 0
# imagelayer 3 10
# imagescale 3 0.9 0
# imageset 4 "Manga_00_1_3"
# imagealpha 4 0 0
# imagelayer 4 10
# imagescale 4 0.9 0
# imageset 5 "Manga_00_2_0"
# imagealpha 5 0 0
# imagelayer 5 8
# imagescale 5 0.9 0
# imageset 6 "Manga_00_2_1"
# imagealpha 6 0 0
# imagelayer 6 10
# imagescale 6 3 0
# imageset 7 "Manga_00_2_2"
# imagealpha 7 0 0
# imagelayer 7 10
# imagescale 7 3 0
# waitandnext 0.5

;;タイトル
# se "SE_0819"
# imagealpha 0 1 1
# imagepos 0 0 0

# imagealpha 0 0 1
# waitandnext 1.5

;;1コマ
# bgm "bgm002" 0

# imagepos 1 0 0
# waitandnext 1.5

;;セリフ
# voice 1038 "yonkoma_1_0001"

# sedelay "SE_6502" 0.7

# imagepos 4 0 -100

;;進む

# imagealpha 3 0 0.5
# imagemoveto 3 0 500 0.4
